item.title: Zoho CRM integration into Google Apps just got even better
item.description:
#“Zoho CRM integration into Google Apps just got even better”

I’m a massive fan of Zoho CRM. Inexpensive but jamemd full of features. I’ve barely scratched the surface of it. Its Goog Apps integration is the best I’ve seen. Full two-way integration with GMail.

I was looking at it today to see if it had Helpdesk functionality and found that it did. But Zoho also has a separate app called Creator Helpdek so I needed to figure out which one to use.

I started doing the Helpdesk->Google Apps integration steps and got stuck. It just sits there saying “Installing Zoho Creator Helpdesk”. But as I followed the steps I noticed a message in the Google Apps Dashboard saying that CRM wanted a bunch of new permissions. I accepted the request but wasn’t sure if it would give any new functionality.
